message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an exclusive price of $200. This limited edition item has been highly sought after and offers exceptional value. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly special.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to stay within a budget of $120. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100 for the product?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to meet you halfway, offering the product for $150. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value it provides. Please let me know if this works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $125 for the product?
